user.name: R3gi CZ
user.about:
I'm hobby amateur designer from Czech Republic. Here I would like to share UI styles for services I use a lot. I think it's better to share them than just keep them for my personal use. That's all. I hope you'll find them useful.

If you like my work, you can write me some feedback or you can by me a beer ;-)

data.name: YouTube's 2012-2015 HTML 5 Player
data.description: This user style changes the look of the current HTML 5 Player to look more like the Flash Player/2012 HTML 5 Player

data.name: YouTube's 2011-2012 HTML 5 Player
data.description:
Brings you the 2011 player back, and one that LOOKS like it.

It goes well with this user-style: https://userstyles.org/styles/117321/youtube-progressbar-fix

data.name: Facebook LifeInvader Logo GTA V
data.description:
Replaces the facebook logo (in classic style) with LifeInvadr from GTA V.

Use with a red theme, [url=described here: https://getlifeinvader.blogspot.com]or with FBP and this tutorial for the full experience![/url]

data.name: Distraction Free Linkedin
data.description: Remove clutter from your linkedin timeline.

data.name: tatoeba.org - compact and fix new layout
data.description:
Fixing some of the things that some members don't like about the new layout.

This userstyle is based on this https://gist.github.com/alanfgh/1da88fffff153d3af08b60749ff24cb8 by AlanF_US.

* removes excessive white space
* removes "translations" and "translations of translations" titles
